pages.title: Bengal Monitor
pages.text: Young monitors may be more arboreal, but adults mainly hunt on the ground, preying mainly on arthropods, but also taking small terrestrial vertebrates, ground birds, eggs and fish.

pages.title: Bengal Monitor
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)2 Colors ($(o)2 Rare Colors$())$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:food_turtle_raw$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: None Days
